data.name: Spirit Wolves
data.detailed_description:
Spirit Wolves is a beautiful third-person exploration game about a lone spirit wolf cub discovering memories left from her pasted spirit wolves. Take control of the young cub play across various gorgeous levels and uncover memories and find hidden puzzles throughout each realm.

Key Features:

  • Not a "wolf simulator," but an emotional, intimate story.
  • A short game hour focused on a story with some light puzzle-solving and platforming.
  • A personal, Intimate story by a solo developer

data.short_description: A gorgeous, 3rd-Person adventure game about a lone spirit wolf cub discovering memories of the past. Take control of a spirit wolf as you discover the memories of each unknown spirit realm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible video card (intel HD graphics not supported)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
